headers.subject: [tosdr:2609] Flattr users must request termination of their account

html:
You may request deletion of your Flattr User Account here http://flattr.com/support/contact.

http://flattr.com/privacy

Title: Flattr users must request termination of their account

Topic: leave

Summary: Instead of allowing users to delete their account firsthand, Flattr states that if users wish to terminate their account, they may request deletion of their account at http://flattr.com/support/contact.  

Score: 40 (mediocre)

--
tosdr.org | twitter.com/tosdr | github.com/tosdr

subject: Flattr users must request termination of their account
text:
>
> You may request deletion of your Flattr User Account here 
> http://flattr.com/support/contact.


http://flattr.com/privacy

Title: Flattr users must request termination of their account

Topic: leave

Summary: Instead of allowing users to delete their account firsthand, 
Flattr states that if users wish to terminate their account, they may 
request deletion of their account at http://flattr.com/support/contact.  

Score: 40 (mediocre)

--
